title: Slow and Hearty Soup
ingredients: ['200g brown lentils', '100g pearl barley', '1 chopped carrot', '2 chopped sticks of celery', '1 chopped onion', '100g chopped cabbage', '1 cube of frozen spinach', '6 cloves minced garlic', '450g cubed pork', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 tsp dried oregano', '1/4 tsp thyme', '750ml chicken stock', '750ml - 1L water', '400g tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tbsp tomato puree', 'salt/pepper to taste', 'To serve', '1 tbsp apple cider vinegar per serving (optional)', 'Grated parmesan cheese (optional)']
